title: FontExplorer X PC Public Beta 1 is now available!
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917022006/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 30.Mar.2007 8.52am 

More details are sure to come, but for now read more here: [http://www.linotype.com/3321/freedownloadpc.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917022006/http:/www.linotype.com/3321/freedownloadpc.html "http://www.linotype.com/3321/freedownloadpc.html")

As with any beta software, especially beta 1, there are many things listed which you will need to read. But, at least it is now available and PC users can shout for joy that they can also use one of the best—if not the best—font management tools available.
author: Miss Tiffany
